name: I think I know I mean err... Yes, but it's all wrong, that is I think I disagree
name_original: I think I know I mean err... Yes, but it's all wrong, that is I think I disagree
description:
⁞⁞ Inspired by 'Strawberry Fields Forever' ⁞⁞

⁞⁞ I think... was created in 36 hours during the Strawberry Jam, which theme was the Beatles' 'Strawberry Fields Forever'. Made with Unity.

⁞⁞ Created by team Jozz: Adriel Beaver, Baptise Billet, César Picart, Chloé Ravallec, Romane Govin

⁞⁞ I think... is a game about trying to escape the unavoidable despair & disenchantment of adulthood. Run for your innocence!

⁞⁞ Single player
